attributes.action: Make smear testing age be reduced to the age of 18
attributes.additional_details:
Look at jade goodie ..!  We all should have the right to say if we want a smere test at 18 
This should be free to anyone that wants it it doesnt have to be compulsory just offered to everyone from the age of 18
attributes.background: I have always had regular smears never had a problem my last one I had was abnormal going to hospital and understanding that it was a grade 2 if left it would turn into cancer ...! so many younger girls commented on wanting to have a test now and some at 25 with abnormalities
